item.title: How can i add Modisland whats the code? Can u tell me please?
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

[quote=“bigh51, post:6, topic:220494”][quote author=SivanScape link=topic=289525.msg2337348#msg2337348 date=1216170970]
no i mean dos anyone have the codes for it? because iam a beginner coder.
I dont know how to code a good area or shops i need help.
Can someone send me the holl area with npcs the shops and so on please?
[/quote]nobody is going to do it for you, learn java before you attempt to make a private server.[/quote]

Exactly, couldn’t have said it better.

Also, theres lots of different locations where people have put there mod zones. We dont know where you want it to be, let alone what you want there. Just figure it out, everbody has to start somewhere, heres your starting place

item.description:
@HOT_babe wrote:

ok so i just copy the thing you writed and give him what he wants 

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modisland") && playerRights >= 1)
	{
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage("Dude, you smell funny. I can't teleport you :D"); 
else
{
		teleportToX = XXXX;
		teleportToY = YYYY;
	sendMessage("Welcome to mod island on SivanScape.");

i didnt add any credits for me and i added funny anti tele text hope this is usefull

item.title: How can i add Modisland whats the code? Can u tell me please?
item.dc:creator: @Systemerror Systemerror
item.description:
@Systemerror wrote:

Open up client.Java, press Control + Find. Search for a teleport command like “Home” then scroll down and all you have to do is change the teleport cords, and the name of the command. Mine looks like this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); else { teleportToX = 3093; teleportToY = 3491; sendMessage("You teleport to Home.");

Now you see the teleportToX? change those cords to the ones you want your modIsland. Under sendmessage write what ever you want. Now… i dont know how to add player rights, if im right i think you add && playerRights >= 1)… i think lol. i hope this help a little, The “HOME” is just a example so dont change the “home” alot of people use it. scroll down, you will find some you wont need.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add Modisland whats the code? Can u tell me please?
item.dc:creator: @HOT_babe HOT babe
item.description:
@HOT_babe wrote:

well im not writing that, becose im booored to explain it to eweryone. W8… Ok…
So i suggest first find coords at look over the place. If you like it remember cords you want to spawn…
Create tele command(im not writing it)… Enter cords, tele name etc… To make place more interesting add some stuff like walls, ladders.
Then make custom stuff, like if you click on ladder it writer(where are you going missy? now your’e in big trouble!) and etc… Well i also want to say, and don’t forget, to make the command ONLY for MODS. hope i gave some ideas
